constructor-arg.value: select * from T_SYS_AUDITLOG where id in ( #foreach( $id in $ids ) $id, #end -1)

select * from T_SYS_AUDITLOG where 1=1
#if($uri) and URI=:uri #end
#if($parameters) and PARAMETERS=:parameters #end
#if($method) and METHOD=:method #end
#if($ip) and IP=:ip #end
#if($responseCode) and RESPONSE_CODE=:responseCode #end
#if($exception) and EXCEPTION=:exception #end
#if($operaterId) and OPERATER_ID=:operaterId #end
#if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME >= :createTimeStart #end #if($createTime) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeEnd #end

select id as id, uri as uri, parameters as parameters, method as method, ip as ip, response_code as responseCode, exception as exception, operater_id as operaterId, create_time as createTime from T_SYS_AUDITLOG log where 1=1
#if($uri) and URI like :uri #end
#if($parameters) and PARAMETERS like :parameters #end
#if($method) and METHOD = :method #end
#if($ip) and IP like :ip #end
#if($responseCode) and RESPONSE_CODE like :responseCode #end
#if($exception && $exception == 'empty') and (EXCEPTION is null or EXCEPTION ='') #end
#if($exception && $exception == 'nonempty') and EXCEPTION is not null and EXCEPTION !='' #end
#if($operatorName) and operater_id is not null and operater_id in( select id from t_au_user where user_name like :operatorName ) #end
#if($createStartDate) and CREATE_TIME >= :createStartDate #end #if($createEndDate) and CREATE_TIME <= :createEndDate #end
delete from T_SYS_AUDITLOG where 1 = 1 #if($createTimeStart) and CREATE_TIME <= :createTimeStart #end
